name: Stop! (Demo)
description:
Stop! is a visual novel in which the player experiences the story through the consciousness of the main character prone to overthinking. Mara is in the middle of her first date with Oliver. She really likes him, but also suspects he might be up to no good. Are her instincts correct or are they just a product of her overthinking? The decision is yours!

NON-COMMERCIAL USE:

'Stop! (Demo)' was presented as the final project for the conclusion of the 7th generation educational program Inkubator Pismo for Unity/C# game developers. 

The game was made during three months period in collaboration between:

Boris Vuković - screenwriter, game designer, and Unity developer (https://personastudio.itch.io/, )

Stefan Majnarić - art designer

Lucija Abramović - art designer

Special thanks to our mentor:
Cwekii Dominik Cvetkovski
